replies.body: I'm genuinely not surprised that nobody wants to be your friend.

> I'm genuinely not surprised that nobody wants to be your friend.

I deny them all, I really don't see the point in having 'friends' added anyway, it's a stupid system because 95% of the time they invite you to their matches or just generally annoy you. I may add people at 30, but I actually doubt it, lol.
